caption.p: Reduced gRNA replication is required for an increased sfRNA:gRNA ratio. Quantification of gRNA levels ( A), sfRNA levels ( B), and sfRNA:gRNA ratios ( C) in A549 cells with cotreatment of NITD008 at increasing concentrations. Ratios of sfRNA:gRNA were not calculated when the gRNA levels were at or below the limit of detection (LOD). Data are presented as mean Â± SD. ** P < 0.01; **** P < 0.00001, one-way ANOVA.
